name: UCL_ANES_PERIOD
description: The UCL_ANES_PERIOD table contains information about the period included for the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the charge record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_PRD_ST_DT_TM
columns.description: The start date and time of the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: ANES_PRD_ED_DT_TM
columns.description: The end date and time of the anesthesia procedure.
